  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • do_part1

      public static String do_part1(String file)
      Performs partioning of movie records in all movie records. First creates part1_manifest.txt that contains names of movie files, part2_manifest.txt that contains genre.csv files, and bad_movie_records.txt that contains all movie records with syntax or semantic errors. Then calls processMovie() to validate the data from each movie in the input files and partition movie records.
      Parameters:
      file - manifeset file that is going to be read
      Returns:
      a String that has the name of the part2 manifest file

    • processMovie

      public static void processMovie(String movieLine, String line, int lineCount)
      Processes a movie and determines whether it is valid or invalid depending on syntax and semantic errors. Syntax and semantic errors throw their respective custom Exceptions and when caught, the invalid movies are written into bad_movie_records.txt with their type of error, movie record, movie file, and position in file. When no exceptions are thrown, valid movies are written into their respective genre files.
      Parameters:
      movieLine - line in movie file that contains the data of a movie
      line - movie file in which the movieLine derives from
      lineCount - the line position of movie in movie file

    • do_part2

      public static String do_part2(String manifestFile)
      Performs task of serialisation of array of Movie objects from part2_manifest.txt First loads movies from each genre csv file into array of Movie objects, then serializes the array into binary files named after their respective genre.
      Parameters:
      manifestFile - manifest file that is going to be read
      Returns:
      name of part3 manifest file

    • loadMoviesFromCSV

      public static Movie[] loadMoviesFromCSV(String csvFileName)
      Takes data from csv files and turns them into Movie object and loads these objects into a Movie[] array.
      Parameters:
      csvFileName - the genre.csv file that is to be read
      Returns:
      array of Movie objects if no exception are thrown

    • serializeMovies

      public static void serializeMovies(Movie[] movies, String outputFile)
      Serializes array of Movies and writes to a binary file depending on the genre
      Parameters:
      movies - array of Movie objects
      outputFile - binary file that is to be written to

    • do_part3

      public static Movie[][] do_part3(String manifestFile)
      Performs task of deserialization of the serialized array of Movie objects from the binary files name in part3_manifest.txt Creates a 2D array of type Movie[][] that will later be used to navigate between genres and movies by genre.
      Parameters:
      manifestFile - manifest file to be read
      Returns:
      returns 2D array of Movie objects

    • deserializeMovies

      public static Movie[] deserializeMovies(String binaryFile)
      Deserializes movies into array of Movies depending on genre
      Parameters:
      binaryFile - binary file to be read from
      Returns:
      array of Movie objects

    • runMenu

      public static void runMenu(Movie[][] allMovies)
      Executes the main menu, allowing user input to navigate through the movies. Allows 3 options: selecting movie array to navigate, navigating movies in genre, and exiting. After selecting movie array to navigate, main menu displays again. Navigation option's genre is updated after user selects a movie array to navigate.
      Parameters:
      allMovies - 2D array of Movie objects

    • numberOfMovies

      public static int[] numberOfMovies()
      Counts the number of movies for each genre in 2D array of Movie objects
      Returns:
      number of movies (second index length) for each genre (first index) of 2D array of Movie objects

    • selectMovieArray

      public static int selectMovieArray(Movie[][] allMovies, Scanner scan)
      Preforms the option of selecting a movie array to navigate through. After selection, the main menu is displayed again.
      Parameters:
      allMovies - 2D array of Movie objects
      scan - a Scanner object used for user input
      Returns:
      the (selected array - 1) to update the navigation genre index in main menu

    • navigateMovies

      public static void navigateMovies(Movie[] movies, String genre, Scanner scan)
      Performs the option of navigating through movies of selected genre. If there are no movies in genre, program prints message and returns to main menu. A range of movies are displayed at a time. User input indicates the index of the last film to be displayed. if said index is results invalid input: '<' 0, BOF message is displayed and if index results > number of available movies, EOF message is displayed. In such cases, movies are displayed up to the top of the array and through the bottom of the array, respectively. The starting point of the navigation updates to the last movie listed.
      Parameters:
      movies - array of Movie objects of a genre
      genre - genre of movies that will be navigated
      scan - a Scanner object used for user input
